name: The Seven Wonders
description:
With her eighteenth birthday nearing, Sky worries about leaving her best friend Emily in the orphanage. As she is plagued by the idea of having nothing after leaving, the new orphan Tai comes into the picture. Along with his mysterious background are new secrets that are about to unfold- and Sky learns that maybe she isn't just an ordinary girl after all.

A fantasy visual novel inspired in the universe of BTS!

This is the full first chapter. If you liked it and wish to support us to continue the story with more chapters, you can do it on Patreon!

The game is still in beta, please let us know if you find any bugs!
